The field is size of 30x18.

Block codes:

0 - Empty
1 - Brick
2 - Steel
3 - Water
4 - Leaves
5 - Gravel
6 - Flag (2x2 size)
7 - Player spawn point (2x2 size)
8 - Bot spawn point (2x2 size)

Template:

0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
0000000000000000000000000000000
